00059 #ifndef HEADER_UI_COMPAT_H
00060 #define HEADER_UI_COMPAT_H
00061 
00062 #include <openssl/opensslconf.h>
00063 #include <openssl/ui.h>

00065 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00066 extern "C" {
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 /* The following functions were previously part of the DES section,
00070    and are provided here for backward compatibility reasons. */
00071 
00072 #define des_read_pw_string(b,l,p,v) \
00073     _ossl_old_des_read_pw_string((b),(l),(p),(v))
00074 #define des_read_pw(b,bf,s,p,v) \
00075     _ossl_old_des_read_pw((b),(bf),(s),(p),(v))
00076 
00077 int _ossl_old_des_read_pw_string(char *buf,int length,const char *prompt,int verify);
00078 int _ossl_old_des_read_pw(char *buf,char *buff,int size,const char *prompt,int verify);
00079 
00080 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00081 }
00082 #endif
00083 #endif
